title: Cheeseburger
subtitle: Wendy's Burger
description: The Cheeseburger Wendy's Burger is a classic fast food that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with a juicy beef patty cooked to perfection, it's topped with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, ripe tomato, and crunchy pickles.

title: Hamburger
subtitle: Veggie Burger
description: The veggieburger is a classic fast food that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, ripe tomato, and crunchy pickles.

title: Hamburger
subtitle: Chicken Burger
description: The Chickenburger is a classic fast food that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with a juicy chicken slice cooked to perfection, it's topped with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, ripe tomato, and crunchy pickles.

title: Hamburger
subtitle: Fried Chicken Burger
description: The Fried Chickenburger is a classic fast food that packs a punch of flavor in every bite. Made with a fried chicken fried to perfection, it's topped with melted American cheese, crispy lettuce, ripe tomato, and crunchy pickles.
